alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 12:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bradley and southeastern Calhoun Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hampton Municipal Airport, or 7 miles south of Hampton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hampton... Calion... Harrell... Ingalls... Hilo... Moro Bay State Park... Hampton Municipal Airport... Moro Bay... Artesian... Johnsonville... Blanchton... Vick... Marsden... Jersey... Gravelridge... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
